installedMods.name: BSIPA
installedMods.description: The new mod loader for Beat Saber. Provides a number of useful tools and features for mods to use.
installedMods.author: DaNike

installedMods.name: CameraPlus
installedMods.description: CameraPlus is a Beat Saber mod that allows for multiple wide FOV cameras with smoothed movement, which makes for a much more pleasant overall spectator experience. For more information view more info.
installedMods.author: Kyle 1413

installedMods.name: SongLoader
installedMods.description: A plugin for adding custom songs into Beat Saber.
installedMods.author: Kyle 1413

installedMods.name: BSIPA
installedMods.description: The new mod loader for Beat Saber. Provides a number of useful tools and features for mods to use.
installedMods.author: DaNike

installedMods.name: ScoreSaber
installedMods.description: Allows you to upload scores to an online leaderboard and compare scores with others. Mod by: Umbranox
installedMods.author: Umbranox

installedMods.name: BeatSaverDownloader
installedMods.description: Enables you to download songs from BeatSaver in-game. Mod by: andruzzzhka
installedMods.author: andruzzzhka

installedMods.name: Harmony
installedMods.description: A library for patching, replacing and decorating .NET and Mono methods during runtime.
installedMods.author: Kyle 1413

installedMods.name: BS Utils
installedMods.description: A basic library for mods to use for common functionality.
installedMods.author: Kyle 1413

installedMods.name: Ini Parser
installedMods.description:
A .NET, Mono and Unity3d compatible(*) library for reading/writing INI data from IO streams, file streams, and strings written in C#.
Not made by myself, refer to github link for author.
installedMods.author: Kyle 1413

installedMods.name: Stream Core
installedMods.description: Stream Core is an IPA based mod designed to allow developers to create interactive chat experiences with ease.
installedMods.author: brian

installedMods.name: MappingExtensions
installedMods.description: This adds a host of new things you can do with your maps as a mapper, view More Info for details.
installedMods.author: Kyle 1413

installedMods.name: CustomUI
installedMods.description: This mod allows for Beat Saber mod developers to implement custom settings user interfaces in a simple and easy way. This mod does nothing on its own!
installedMods.author: PlasmaPower

installedMods.name: Custom Colors
installedMods.description: Allows you to customize your colors in Beat Saber
installedMods.author: Kyle 1413

installedMods.name: Custom Sabers
installedMods.description: A plugin for custom beat saber sabers
installedMods.author: Kyle 1413

installedMods.name: Custom Avatars
installedMods.description: Plugin to use custom avatars in Beat Saber. PgUp and PgDn to cycle between avatars in your CustomAvatars folder; Home to toggle visibility in the headset.
